feed.title: Pierre Jack Wilken
feed.subtitle: Pierre Jack Wilken - specialized in Open Source, Software Architecture, IT Infrastructure and DevOps. It's definitely not just about technologies, combining tech with a good work/life culture and an understanding of patterns and improvement processes makes it.
